youtube.title: Total Knee Replacement Surgery: Step-by-Step 3D Animation
youtube.description: Discover the incredible process of a total knee replacement surgery in this detailed 3D animation. Learn how orthopedic surgeons remove damaged cartilage and replace it with high-quality metal and plastic implants to restore mobility and relieve chronic pain. Perfect for students and curious minds!
